item.description:
The Pawsox Annual Star Wars day is back in 2011.

Reserved seats are almost sold out (there are no large blocks left).  We'll be going in GA this time.  Get John $7 before 5/8 and he'll buy a block of tickets online.  As we will be going in to the GA seats this is not necessary, and you can just purchase your ticket at the game (assuming it doesn't sell out)

FYI - The game starts at 1:05, the early start time is for the Star Wars day and so you can get to the free parking near the stadium.  Also with GA seating, it's first come/first serve so we'll try to have a few folks go in and save us some seats/left field berm grass :-)

Sunday Run the Bases

After each and every Sunday home game at McCoy Stadium during the 2011 season, you will have the opportunity to run the bases after the game.
item.how_to_find_us: Find John in his VA Tech Baseball Cap and Jersey outside by the ticket windows before the game. Go Hokies!
item.why: Who doesn't love star wars and baseball? Come and join the PawSox and the cast of characters from Star Wars at McCoy Stadium.
item.name: Star Wars Day at the Pawsox vs Scranton/Wilkes-Barre Yankees game
